comment: MD001 Heading levels only increment by one level at a time.
MD002 First heading should be a level 2 heading.
MD003 Heading style: start with hashes.
MD004 Unordered list style: dash.
MD005 Consistent indentation for list items at the same level.
MD006 Lists do not need to start at the beginning of the line.
MD007 Unordered list indentation: 4 spaces.
MD009 Two trailing spaces create a line break.

no-trailing-spaces.comment: Empty lines inside list items should not be indented.

comment: MD010 No hard tabs, not even in code blocks.
MD011 Catch reversed link syntax.
MD013 No maximum line length.
MD014 No ($) before commands without showing output.
MD024 No multiple headings with the same content.
MD026 Whitelist trailing punctuation in heading.
MD028 Allow blank line inside blockquote.
MD033 Allow inline HTML.
MD034 No bare URLs
MD036 Allow emphasized text on its own line.
MD040 Fenced code blocks must have a language specified.
MD041 First line in file should be a top level header.
MD044 Capitalize whatever you want.
